Description: NO0 - No measurements, NO1 - Prohibition of public events and public facilities, NO2 - Restrictions on very large agglomerations (above 500 people), NO3 - Restrictions on gatherings between 100-499 people, NO4 - Restrictions on gatherings between 50-99 people, GN5 - Restrictions on gatherings between 5-49 people, GN6 - Total ban on crowded events or activities, GO0 - Directed or conditional, GO1 - General
NO0 - No measurements, NO1 - Suggests closing, NO2 - Requires closing, GO0 - Directed or conditional, GO1 - General

NO0 - No measurements, NO1 - Home office for people with symptoms or from some risk groups, NO2 - Optional Home Office, NO3 - Strategic scheduling work, NO4 - Mandatory Home Office, GO0 - Directed or conditional, GO1 - General
NO0 - No measurements, NO1 - Vertical insulation, NO2 - Horizontal insulation, GO0 - Directed or conditional, GO1 - General

Field label: Closure of non-essential businesses and public activities
Description: 0 - No measurements, +1 - Closing of malls, +1 – Non-essential business suspension, +1 - Suspension of bars and restaurants, +1 - Prohibition of activities in public spaces (beaches, parks, etc.), +1 - Suspension of religious activities, +1 - Closing of cultural spaces (theater, cinema, museum), +1 – Gym closures, SGCj – The sum of measures that was general, SCj - The sum of restrictions applied, Ncj - The Number of possible restrictions

Field label: Transport blocking (Considering only road and river transport)
Description: 0 - No measurements, +1 - Suspension in urban buses, +1 - Suspension on intercity buses, +1 - Suspension on interstate buses, +1 - Total suspension of transport in the city, +1 - Total suspension of transport between cities, +1 – Total suspension of transport between states, SGCj – The sum of measures that was general, SCj - The sum of restrictions applied, Ncj - The Number of possible restrictions

Field label: The ordinal class presents a clear order on the strength of the constraint
Type: Formula to calculate named columns starting with O

Field label: The cumulative class does not have a clear order of constraint strength.
Type: Formula to calculate named columns starting in C
